sent.orig: Maternity leave, paternity leave, carers' leave and leave are not costs but essential to our wellbeing.
sent.trans: 产假，初为人父假期，护理者假期，病假等对心灵健康至关重要，绝不是一种额外花费。

sent.orig: No, impossible to leave this dear bustling plaice, impossible to leave Tianqiao, leave Beiping.
sent.trans: 不，他不能离开这个热闹可爱的地方，不能离开天桥，不能离开北平。

sent.orig: Holiday & Leave (Annual paid leave, sick leave etc).
sent.trans: 法定假期和带薪年假，病假等等。

sent.orig: Calculate and keep track of employees' annual leave, marriage leave and sick leave.
sent.trans: 根据公司的年假休假制度，计算并统计每个员工的休假（病假，年假及婚假）情况。

sent.orig: Just away and leave me as I leave you. II.
sent.trans: 只管开走，就像我离开你一样离开我。
